Detailed Description

macro definition of sample() which resamples from a normal distrubution until a value within range is found.

Function Documentation

int param_error ( float  low,
float  mean,
float  high,
char *  msg 
)

Utility routine to implement a stochastic parameter check.

checks to see if the low, mean, and high make sense, and if the mean falls within the acceptable range for computation of the median as required by the broken stick calculation.

also returns an error message in caller supplied variable.

Return: 0 no error 1 error
